means: 没有价值的，没有长远目标的，不负责任的
没有价值地，没有长远目标地，不负责任地
没有价值，没有长远目标，不负责任

sentence.Network_en: Her husband was a charming, but lazy and feckless man.
sentence.Network_cn: 她的丈夫讨人喜欢，但却是个懒惰没有出息的人。

sentence.Network_en: He regarded the young man as feckless and irresponsible.
sentence.Network_cn: 他认为这个年轻人不光无能，还不负责任。

sentence.Network_en: German banks lent hand over fist to feckless foreign borrowers.
sentence.Network_cn: 德国银行曾向财务状况不佳的外国借款人大量放贷.

list.abs: although Trevor was admired by his colleagues at the newspaper , he turned out to be a feckless reporter , and so he was reassigned to the copy desk .尽管特雷弗在报社倍受同事们的钦佩，事实证明他是个无能的记者，所以他被重新分配到新闻编辑部。
believe the headlines and Europe's worst economic headache by far is Greece , financially feckless and socially volatile .料想新闻头条以及欧洲最麻烦的经济问题，到目前为止仍是希腊，经济萎靡，社会动荡。
Generous benefits distort the labour market and may encourage feckless behaviour ., 慷慨的补助会使劳动力市场扭曲 , 可能会鼓励懒惰行为.
generous benefits distort the labour market and may encourage feckless behaviour .慷慨的补助会使劳动力市场扭曲，可能会鼓励懒惰行为。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Scots and northern English dialect feck (from effeck, variant of effect) + -less

entry.tran: 无能的;软弱的;不中用的
entry.def: If you describe someone as feckless, you mean that they lack determination or strength, and are unable to do anything properly.

example.ex: He regarded the young man as feckless and irresponsible.
example.tran: 他认为这个年轻人不光无能，还不负责任。

auth_sentence.content: The feckless lad preferred to paint and draw.
auth_sentence.res_content: The feckless lad preferred to paint and draw.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The feckless lad preferred to paint and draw.

auth_sentence.content: Her gripes, as ever, are with a multitude of feckless men.
auth_sentence.res_content: Her gripes, as ever, are with a multitude of feckless men.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Her gripes, as ever, are with a multitude of feckless men.

auth_sentence.content: We'd left our topcoats at home, but kids are ever feckless.
auth_sentence.res_content: We'd left our topcoats at home, but kids are ever feckless.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: We'd left our topcoats at home, but kids are ever feckless.

stems_affixes.word_buile: bound边界+less无……的→adj.无限的,无边无际的
care关心+less无……的,不……的→不关心→粗心的,疏忽的
color颜色+less无……的,不……的→adj.无色的
doubt怀疑+less无……的,不……的→adj. 无疑的,确定的
effort努力+less无……的,不……的→adj.不费力的
fathom测量深度;长度单位[6英尺]+less无……的,不……的→没法测量→深不可测的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
stems_affixes.word_buile: fault犯错误,欺骗+less无……的,不……的→adj.无错误的,无缺点的,完美的
feck价值,效果+less无……的,不……的→adj.无目标无计划的
flaw瑕疵+less无……的,不……的→adj.完美的,无瑕疵的
grace优美,文雅+less无……的,不……的→adj.粗俗的
hap机会,运气+less无→无运气的
help帮助+less无……的,不……的→adj.无助的,无能的,没用的
home家+less无……的,不……的→adj.无家可归的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
stems_affixes.word_buile: hope希望+less无……的,不……的→adj.没有希望的,绝望的,不可救药
nerve神经,胆量,勇气+less无……的,不……的→adj.无力的,无勇气的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
relent变宽厚,变温和+less无……的,不……的→adj.无情的,残酷的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 得不到休息的,不平静的,不安宁的

tire疲劳,劳累+less无……的,不……的→adj.不疲劳的
value价值+less无……的,不……的→adj.不足道的
regard注视;尊敬+less无……的,不……的→不注视,不尊敬→不放在眼里→不注意的
